about.title: About me
about.description: I graduated from Computer Engineering in 2025 and I'm passionate about building modern web applications. As a full-stack developer, I love working on both frontend and backend technologies. My favorite part of development is creating seamless user experiences while ensuring robust backend architecture.
about.frontend: For frontend development, I work with Next.js, React, and Angular. On the backend, I use .NET Core and Node.js. For databases, I'm experienced with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MSSQL. I enjoy learning new technologies and staying up-to-date with the latest development trends.
about.career: I'm currently seeking opportunities to grow as a full-stack developer and contribute to innovative projects. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating applications that make a difference.
